Package it.unipr.netsec.nemo.networkfunction

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilterFunction
    It drops or accepts all packets.
    Ip6SrAddFunction
    Adds IPv6 SR Header with a given segment list.
    Ip6SrFunction
    IPv6 Segment-Routing (SR) function.
    Ip6SrMangleFunction
    It mangles the IPv6 header in order to masquerade the presence of the IPv6 SR Header (SRH).
    NetworkFunction
    Generic Network Function.
    NetworkFunctionChain
    Chain of Network Functions
